title: When you finally reach the rank you want in league

replies.body:
I got bronze 5 I DID IT https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CgRKrltABC0/hqdefault.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/VxcDTXw.png
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/vZb7-Q9Talk/hqdefault.jpg
I just want silver by the end of the season lol. I got 20 some odd days left. I should make it back up.

I was getting worried I would never get diamond before the season ended.

But then worlds happened and I saw how broken Rumble/kennen/jayce are and I climbed very fast after that lol
See I set my expectations low (Silver every season) so if I do get higher (I'm prob going to try to climb for gold s7) it would be a pleasant surprise.

Well I hope you get silver and gold :^)

Read guides for champions you play and use sites like champion.gg to see counter picks and builds.
If the enemy team doesn't ban {{champion:122}} then they're giving me a free win if they do then i will usually go yas, renek, or nasus top depending on the matchup

> [{quoted}](name=Best Kog NA,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rWE3Mv62,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T22:29:28.274+0000)
>
> I just want silver by the end of the season lol. I got 20 some odd days left. I should make it back up.

Funny, I want the same thing. By God I was already there and I idiotically chose to play a bunch of games with B4s and B5s. Couldn't carry some of these dudes and dropped back into Bronze. I hit a rough patch of some really really terrible allies and fell all the way down to B3.

I have no doubt that I could get back to Silver. I actually fell to Bronze before playing with lesser players and I got back after a couple weeks. But now, I don't have enough time. I'm getting far too many uncarriable allies for me to make it before the 7th of November. I should have stopped playing ranked this close to season's end after making it to Silver the second time. Now I'm probably not gonna get that Silver border. Next year for that I guess. I'm gonna keep trying for it this year though but I have serious doubts.

I've learned that climbing is not about being better than your elo, it's about being better than your elo AND having the time to play many games.
Just treat the game like it's a chess game late game.

> [{quoted}](name=Best Kog NA,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rWE3Mv62,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-19T22:51:58.137+0000)
>
> Just treat the game like it's a chess game late game.

Late game....now there' something I haven't seen in a while. I just had a game with 1-17 jungle Vayne on my team and a bot lane that gave a double kill in 2 minutes. There's no such thing as late game with these assholes I'm getting.

I'm trying to ride this shit out until I start getting normal allies. They don't have to be particularly good, just good enough not to feed and I can ride my way back to Silver by hard carrying like I did before. I'll ride it out eventually. Only question is, will it be in time to get to Silver again before Nov 7th.
I gave up on tying to get to gold this season. I'm ok with silver 4 for my first ranked season result.

I got silver 4 in my first ranked season as well :^)!

Season 3 silver

season 4 gold

season 5 plat

season 6 diamond
